mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.kecheng_id as kechengId ,a.jiaoxueziliao_name as jiaoxueziliaoName ,a.jiaoxueziliao_types as jiaoxueziliaoTypes ,a.jiaoxueziliao_file as jiaoxueziliaoFile ,a.jiaoxueziliao_content as jiaoxueziliaoContent ,a.banben as banben ,a.fenxiang_types as fenxiangTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,kecheng.laoshi_id as kechengLaoshiId ,kecheng.yuanxi_types as yuanxiTypes ,kecheng.kecheng_name as kechengName ,kecheng.kecheng_types as kechengTypes ,kecheng.kecheng_address as kechengAddress ,kecheng.xuefen as xuefen ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM jiaoxueziliao a left JOIN kecheng kecheng ON a.kecheng_id = kecheng.id left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} or kecheng.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} ) or fenxiang_types = 1 )
and ( a.kecheng_id = #{params.kechengId} )
and a.jiaoxueziliao_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoxueziliaoName},'%')
and a.jiaoxueziliao_types = #{params.jiaoxueziliaoTypes}
and a.jiaoxueziliao_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoxueziliaoContent},'%')
and a.banben like CONCAT('%',#{params.banben},'%')
and a.fenxiang_types = #{params.fenxiangTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.kecheng_id IS NOT NULL
and kecheng.yuanxi_types = #{params.yuanxiTypes}
and kecheng.kecheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengName},'%')
and kecheng.kecheng_types = #{params.kechengTypes}
and kecheng.kecheng_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengAddress},'%')
and kecheng.xuefen >= #{params.xuefenStart}
and kecheng.xuefen <= #{params.xuefenEnd}
and kecheng.xuefen = #{params.xuefen}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(kecheng.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(kecheng.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
